the dead GitHub theory Text version: https://pivot-to-ai.com/2025/05/20/github-wants-to-spam-open-source-projects-with-ai-slop/

Creating issues with Copilot on github.com is in public preview https://github.blog/changelog/2025-05-19-creating-issues-with-copilot-on-github-com-is-in-public-preview/ GitHub Copilot coding agent in public preview https://github.blog/changelog/2025-05-19-github-copilot-coding-agent-in-public-preview/ ‚ÄúAllow us to block Copilot-generated issues (and PRs) from our own repositories‚Äù https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/159749

item.title: Expire vs Remove. Which should we use in Fusion Cache?
item.description:
Expire vs Remove. Which should we use in Fusion Cache?
Fusion Cache quickly became my favorite caching library for C#. Can't live without it!
In this video, we go over some of the basic cache operations we have access to.
Watch the full tutorial here: https://youtu.be/wmvEFWSE49g
item.author: (Dev Leader)

item.title: Master The Basics of MSTest Like a PRO In Under 15 minutes!
item.description:
For centuries one testing framework has dominated the donet scene... but is it all over for xUnit?!
In this video, we'll explore MSTest and how some of the great Microsoft Testing Platform capabilities have made their way in.
Is it enough to get you to move from xUnit?!
